subject: Testing with a lot of virtualized machines
msgSnippet: Hi, I am interested in gathering insight into executing and managing tests where the environment is a possibly large set of virtualized (ie, VMWare) machines
messageBody:
Hi,

I am interested in gathering insight into executing and managing tests
where the environment is a possibly large set of virtualized (ie,
VMWare) machines of various configurations.

I am just aware (reading websites, white papers, etc...) of JUnit
extensions such as GridGain, JTR. Also thinking possibly about XMPP
to assist in the communication of starting virtualized machines,
executing tests, collecting results, etc....

Just gathering thoughts, links, ideas of anyone who has constructed
such a test environment.

Thanks,

Mike
